actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that ministers may elect at any time not to be covered by Social Security with respect to future services as a minister.
short_title: Clergy Freedom of Choice Act of 1999
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Clergy Freedom of Choice Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that ministers may elect at any time not to be covered by Social Security with respect to future services as a minister.

titles.title: Clergy Freedom of Choice Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that ministers may elect at any time not to be covered by Social Security with respect to future services as a minister.
